name: playwright_automation_testing
description: This a project where I am learning how to automate web applications using Playwright testing framework.

scripts.testsAllureReport: npx playwright test --project=chromium --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate allure-results --clean
scripts.webTestsAllureReport: npx playwright test --project=chromium --grep @Web --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate allure-results --clean
scripts.APITestsAllureReport: npx playwright test --project=chromium --grep @API --reporter=line,allure-playwright && allure generate allure-results --clean

author: Mario Nizic
